topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e9708f63687259c4f10300#post_54e9708f63687259c4f10300
It reeeaally does, like I had all the main G Gundams mostly!

I had Shining Gundam, American Gundam, Rose Gundam, Dragon Gundam, Ball Gundam, And that one that looked kind of like a ninja? 

Cant remember the name? 

I had most of the main character's gundams! And gone! all gone! I even had that Butler Gundam! 

Plus the one I just showed a picture of. 

Oh _*I EVEN HAD FREAKING ZOID FIGURES! ZOOOOID FIGURES!*_

I had a Giant Mega Man and zero Model in that toy box too! all of it! GONE! ALL OF IT! AND I NEVER KNEW IT WAS GONE!
